universum.studios.android.officium.event

Class MainEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.officium.event.SimpleEventBus
      • universum.studios.android.officium.event.MainEventBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventBus

    public class MainEventBus
extends SimpleEventBus
    A SimpleEventBus implementation that may be used for event buses that should post their events on the Main thread. This event bus implementation uses Handler with main looper to post the events supplied to post(Object) on the Main UI thread.
    Since:
    1.2
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainEventBus()
      Same as MainEventBus(Bus) with default instance of Bus.
      MainEventBus(Bus bus)
      Creates a new instance of MainEventBus that wraps the specified bus.
